Definition: In this task, a food review will be given to you. You have to Classify the sentiment of the reviewer toward the food into: "negative", "neutral", "positive", and "mixed". The mixed category indicates reviews where none of the sentiments are dominant (mix of positive and negative, or borderline cases); hence it is hard to detect the primary sentiment. Also, assign neutral label to reviews that express no clear sentiment toward an entity or any aspect of it.

Positive Examples.explanation: This review expressed a negative sentiment toward chocolate.

Positive Examples.explanation: This review is positive because the reviewer thinks it is the best choice.

Negative Examples.explanation: In this review, none of the sentiments are dominant (mix of positive and negative), so the correct label is "mixed".

Negative Examples.explanation: The reviewer's sentiment toward the food is negative.
